mapper.select:
SELECT stocktemp.stock_id as stock_id, stocktemp.show_capacity as show_capacity, stocktemp.shop_capacity as shop_capacity , stocktemp.sell_capacity as sell_capacity , stocktemp.status as status, p.product_uuid as product_uuid, p.name as name , p.pic as pic
FROM product p LEFT JOIN
(SELECT s.stock_id as stock_id, s.show_capacity as show_capacity, s.shop_capacity as shop_capacity , s.sell_capacity as sell_capacity , s.status as status, s.product_uuid AS product_uuid FROM stock s,manager m
WHERE s.shop_id = m.shop_id AND m.manager_id =#{shopId}) stocktemp
ON p.product_uuid = stocktemp.product_uuid
WHERE p.type_id != 10
AND p.status=1 AND p.product_uuid IN (SELECT apc.product_uuid FROM manager m,agent_cfg a,agent_product_cfg apc
WHERE m.manager_id=#{shopId} AND m.manager_id=a.agent_id AND a.agent_cfg_id=apc.agent_cfg_id GROUP BY apc.product_uuid)
and p.name=#{name}
AND p.type_id=#{typeId}
AND stocktemp.status= #{status}
order by p.code asc
select * from stock where shop_id = #{shopId} and product_uuid=#{productUuid}

mapper.update:
UPDATE stock
show_capacity =show_capacity + #{showCapacity},
shop_capacity =shop_capacity + #{shopCapacity},
status = #{status},
update_by_adm = #{updateByAdm},
update_date = now(),
WHERE stock_id = #{stockId}
